pages.text: A rarer breed, Mudis were originally bred as herding dogs in Hungary and served as loyal farm dogs.$(br2)Standing at roughly three quarters of a block tall, these intelligent dogs come in five coats.
These dogs can most commonly be found in plains and meadows. They can also be found in some badlands and more rarely in snowy plains.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
